import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get activities for multiple tickets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/activities"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves ticket activities for multiple tickets in a single request. This is a batch operation that accepts a list of ticket IDs in the request body and returns activities for all specified tickets.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketIds** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to search for tickets and extract `Items[].TicketId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with filters → extract multiple `Items[].TicketId` values.
2. Call [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/activities](/docs/api/tickets/get-activities-for-tickets) with the list of ticket IDs.
3. Process the combined activity feed for reporting or display.

**Pagination**: Supports `$p` (page index) and `$s` (page size) query parameters.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"$p","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","default":0},"description":"Zero-based page index for pagination."},{"name":"$s","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","default":20},"description":"Number of activities per page."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"List of ticket IDs to retrieve activities for."},"example":["a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","b2c3d4e5-f6a7-8901-bcde-f23456789012"]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Activities retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Paginated response containing ticket activities.","properties":{"Items":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Represents an activity or comment on a ticket.","properties":{"TicketActivityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the activity."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product identifier.","nullable":true},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the activity was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the activity was last modified."},"IsPublic":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the activity is visible to end users."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the activity has been soft-deleted."},"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Parent ticket identifier."},"TicketSubject":{"type":"string","description":"Subject of the parent ticket.","nullable":true},"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier who created the activity."},"OwnerDetails":{"type":"string","description":"Quick reference display name for the owner.","nullable":true},"ActivityItems":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of polymorphic items making up the activity content.","items":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true,"description":"Polymorphic activity item. >
  
</StatusCodes>
